# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

# Solution
```
# Function to transform a single word into pig latin
function pig_latinify(word::AbstractString)
  first_letter = word[1]
  other_letters = word[2:end]
  is_vowel = in(first_letter, ('a','e','i','o','u')) # Check whether first letter is a vowel
  return is_vowel ? "$other_letters$first_letteray" : "$other_letters$first_letteray"
end

# Function to apply pig latin transformation over a vector of strings
function pig_latinify(words::Vector{AbstractString})
  transform = pig_latinify.(words) # Apply transformation on each word
  Threads.@threads for word in transform # Threaded loop
    println(word) # Print pig latin translated word
